description:
Sakuta has a dream that Mai reveals herself as the true identity of Touko Kirishima at a music festival held on April 1st. At the same time, several major social media platforms were being flooded with posts containing the hashtag #DREAMING, leading to platform crashes and access errors. As the hashtag #DREAMING causes chaos among the public, Tomoe Koga tells Sakuta that she had a dream that Mai got into an accident, rendering her unconscious during an event where she was collaborating with the police for a public safety awareness. Sakuta remembers the message he received from himself in the other possible world, stating that Mai is in danger. As he is riddled with worry, the Miniskirt Santa appears before him once again.
Source: Crunchyroll
